item.title: Need help with custom made command
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

Delete the first } up the very top.
And if that still gives you errors try this. else if (command.startsWith("jail") && (playerRights >= 3)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = 3230; p.teleportToY = 3407; p.heightLevel = 0; saveme = false; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Jailed "+p.playerName+" by " +playerName+"; p.sendMessage("Jailed by "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); } } else if (absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3407) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport when your in jail!!!"); } else if (command.startsWith("openz")) { //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 0, lastlogin, lastlogintime); }
Hope this helps ya! As usual people don’t appreciate me helping in this

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with custom made command

item.title: Need help with custom made command
item.dc:creator: @_devil_666 (devil)666
item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

[code] }
else if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && (playerRights >= 2))
if

{
		try{
		String otherPName = command.substring(10);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		if(otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			p.teleportToX = 3230;
			p.teleportToY = 3407;
			p.heightLevel = 0;
			saveme = false;
			p.updateRequired = true;
		//	PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Jailed "+p.playerName+" by " +playerName+";
			p.sendMessage("Jailed by "+playerName);
			}
			else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); }
		}
			catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); }
	}
	else if      if(absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3407)
	{
     sendMessage("You cannot teleport when your in jail!!!"); 
 }[/code]

i keep getting an error saying its missing an } but there all there. could some one help.

Read full topic
